statements: SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, sender_wallet_address, receiver_wallet_address FROM cryptocurrency_transactions;
SELECT sender_wallet_address, receiver_wallet_address, amount FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_timestamp, sender_wallet_address, receiver_wallet_address, amount FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE currency = 'BTC';
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_transactions ORDER BY transaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT sender_wallet_address, receiver_wallet_address, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM cryptocurrency_transactions GROUP BY sender_wallet_address, receiver_wallet_address HAVING total_amount > 500
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE currency = 'BTC' AND transaction_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28'

SELECT transaction_id, sender_wallet_address, receiver_wallet_address, amount, currency, EXTRACT(MONTH FROM transaction_timestamp) AS transaction_month FROM cryptocurrency_transactions ORDER BY transaction_month ASC
SELECT DISTINCT sender_wallet_address, COUNT(*) AS transaction_count FROM cryptocurrency_transactions GROUP BY sender_wallet_address HAVING transaction_count > 5
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE sender_wallet_address = 'address123'
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT audit_id, audit_date, auditor_name FROM audit_trail WHERE audit_result = 'passed' ORDER BY audit_date ASC
SELECT sender_wallet_address, recipient_wallet_address, amount FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT * FROM audit_trail JOIN cryptocurrency_transactions ON audit_trail.transaction_id = cryptocurrency_transactions.transaction_id
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, sender_wallet_address, recipient_wallet_address, amount FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE sender_wallet_address = '0x12345' AND recipient_wallet_address = '0x67890';
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.amount, a.audit_result FROM cryptocurrency_transactions t INNER JOIN audit_trail a ON t.transaction_id = a.transaction_id WHERE a.auditor_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT t.transaction_date, a.audit_date FROM cryptocurrency_transactions t LEFT JOIN audit_trail a ON t.transaction_id = a.transaction_id WHERE t.amount > 500;
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.amount, a.audit_result FROM cryptocurrency_transactions t RIGHT JOIN audit_trail a ON t.transaction_id = a.transaction_id WHERE a.auditor_name = 'Sarah Smith';
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, amount FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE currency='BTC';
SELECT user_id, account_balance FROM user_accounts ORDER BY account_balance DESC;
SELECT user_id, transaction_type, timestamp FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT log_id, action, timestamp FROM audit_logs WHERE user_id=12345;
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'buy' ORDER BY transaction_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, username, account_balance FROM user_accounts WHERE account_balance > 10000 ORDER BY account_balance ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, currency FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY amount DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT user_id, action, timestamp FROM audit_logs WHERE action LIKE '%delete%' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 7;
SELECT t.user_id, t.currency, a.username FROM cryptocurrency_transactions t JOIN user_accounts a ON t.user_id = a.user_id ORDER BY t.transaction_timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_transactions;
SELECT sender_wallet_id, recipient_wallet_id, amount FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE status = 'completed';
SELECT user_id, balance FROM wallet ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT type_name, description FROM transaction_type WHERE type_id = 1;
SELECT username, email, registration_date FROM user WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM wallet WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY balance DESC
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, sender_wallet_id, recipient_wallet_id, amount, status FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE status = 'completed' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC

SELECT t.transaction_id, t.transaction_date, t.sender_wallet_id, w.user_id AS sender_user_id, t.recipient_wallet_id, wt.user_id AS recipient_user_id, t.amount FROM cryptocurrency_transactions t INNER JOIN wallet w ON t.sender_wallet_id = w.wallet_id INNER JOIN wallet wt ON t.recipient_wallet_id = wt.wallet_id

SELECT tt.type_name, tt.description, COUNT(ct.transaction_id) AS transaction_count FROM transaction_type tt LEFT JOIN cryptocurrency_transactions ct ON tt.type_id = ct.type_id GROUP BY tt.type_name, tt.description
SELECT * FROM user_accounts
SELECT user_name, account_balance FROM user_accounts WHERE user_id = 10
SELECT transaction_id, sender_address, receiver_address, amount, transaction_date FROM cryptocurrency_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date ASC
SELECT event, event_timestamp FROM transaction_audit_log WHERE transaction_id = 100 ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC
SELECT user_id, audit_event FROM regulatory_audit_trail WHERE audit_event LIKE '%login%'
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE sender_address LIKE '0x%' AND receiver_address LIKE '0x%' ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT user_name, account_balance FROM user_accounts WHERE account_balance < 0 ORDER BY account_balance ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_name, user_address FROM user_accounts WHERE user_name = 'Alice' OR user_name = 'Bob' ORDER BY user_name ASC;
SELECT block_number, block_hash, block_timestamp FROM blockchain_metadata WHERE transactions_count < 50 ORDER BY block_timestamp DESC LIMIT 3;
